text: The Girl in the Taxi is a 1921 American silent comedy film directed by Lloyd Ingraham and starring Flora Parker DeHaven, Carter DeHaven, King Baggot, Grace Cunard, and Otis Harlan. It is based on the 1912 English-language adaptation of German play by Frederick Fenn and Arthur Wimperis. The film was released by Associated First National Pictures in April 1921. ==Cast== *Flora Parker DeHaven as Mignon Smith (as Mrs. Carter De Haven) *Carter DeHaven as Bertie Stewart *King Baggot as Maj. Frederick Smith *Grace Cunard as Marietta *Otis Harlan as Alexis *Tom McGuire as John Stewart *Margaret Campbell as Clara Stewart *Lincoln Plumer as Percy Peters *Freya Sterling as Mary Peters *John Gough as Dr. Paul ==Preservation== A copy of The Girl in the Taxi survives in BFI National Archive.American Silent Feature Film Survival Database: The Girl in the Taxi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1921 comedy films Category:American drama films Category:American films Category:1921 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:First National Pictures films
title: The Girl in the Taxi (1921 film)
